comment.author: 46034804@N07
comment._content:
Some notes on the Fernland ref World Ship Society Fernley & Eger 1869-1969
Yard Number 325 FERNLAND
1961 renamed  STARCARRIER
29/9/61 damaged by explosion at Diego-Suarez Madagascar
sank while being towed out to sea. 27 people on board lost their lives.
